title: Corrective Chiropractic Care | Abundant Health Chiropractic
author: Kieran
description: Are you interested in learning more about Corrective Chiropractic Care and how it differs from standard Chiropractic? Click to see how Corrective Chiropractic can help you.
cleaned_text: Why Do You Need A Naturopath? Are you tired? Are you in pain? Are you sick? Are you trying to achieve better health, but have found progress and change difficult? Naturopathic medicine is a well-established healthcare profession that combines the wisdom of nature with the benefits of modern science. Naturopathic doctors (NDs) are trained as primary care providers who diagnose, treat and manage patients with acute and chronic conditions, while addressing disease and dysfunction at the level of body, mind and spirit. So, what's it all about? It's about YOU. It's about your Health and the quality of your daily life. I am passionate about helping you find better health, naturally. Are you tired? Are you in pain? Are you sick? Are you trying to achieve better health, but have found progress and change difficult? Naturopaths are clinicians, authors, scholars, researchers, and entrepreneurs, and are increasingly in demand across the country to help us with: Digestion Pain Relief Weight Loss Low Energy Hormonal Imbalances And Many More.... Our Naturopath - Kelly Cullen My Story I am a Naturopath, Board Certified Holistic Health Practitioner, Digestive Health Professional, Nutritional Consultant and Weight Loss Specialist. I have been helping point my clients toward better health for over 12 years. I believe that our bodies were created to heal themselves, and when given the proper tools, we are better equipped to do just that. My health journey began almost 20 years ago. I had chronic headaches and digestive issues until a Naturopath helped me get to the root of my issues. I believe in natural health because I saw first hand how it transformed my life. My Specialties Nutritional Consultation RBTI Evaluation Digestion Zyto Scan Healy Sessions Foundations of Health Weight Loss Consultation BOOK AN APPOINTMENT TODAY! 'Pleasant Wellness' is all about Helping my clients understand the most common root causes of ill health. After we understand what is happening in your body, then we will step towards a vibrant, healthy, energetic life, the natural way. Set up an appointment that suits your schedule. We'll meet for about 90 minutes and get started. You'll get all the instructions you need prior to our time together. Can't wait to meet you personally, hear what's going on and see how I can help you.
